content:
Krepe Dog is an upcoming gourmet hot dog and fresh cut seasoned fries modern food truck waiting to ignite right here in Turlock PERIOD Krepe Dog brings to the Central Valley a taste of the city without the hassle of burning the gas to get there PERIOD

The owners Eileen and Jorge Rodriguez wanted to bring something trendy and inviting to the valley where good atmosphere was within reach and people of all ages could sit down and enjoy their hot dogs and fries PERIOD

Eileen and Jorge Rodriguez in front of their food truck Krepe Dog PERIOD Photo courtesy of Eileen Rodriguez

I always knew I didnt wanna work for anyone else and Jorge feels the same way we always had that mentality like okay were gonna make something of our own. a food truck seemed like a good idea and its an upcoming and growing industry PERIOD Im from LA Los Angeles and Im used to the food trucks and the different things they offer PERIOD I wanted to bring something different to Turlock and I felt the food truck was the way to go said Eileen Rodriguez PERIOD

She added that the startup idea came from a friend that pitched them the concept PERIOD They began to look into  Eileen Rodriguez said PERIOD

 Eileen Rodriguez said PERIOD

Jorge and Eileen have supported each other before they started dating PERIOD They mulled around ideas to open up a business whether that be together or not PERIOD They soon fell in love and merged their dream into a reality by building their business together PERIOD It is their 

Ive been there through the entire process in their business and in their relationship we jumped online to see what we could find  about hot dogs PERIOD I know they traveled to LA and to SF San Francisco to sample some of the most highly reviewed hot dog restaurants PERIOD Even on the way back from their wedding in Tahoe they stopped at a hot dog truck to compare and get ideas said a close friend Jairo Jay Aguilar PERIOD

In the future Eileen and Jorge plan to open up a second Krepe Dog which may be a second food truck or a second location in a building PERIOD .. PERIOD Right now our main concern is to provide the best service quality and comfortable atmosphere and most importantly the best food possible said Eileen Rodriguez PERIOD

 said Jorge Rodriguez PERIOD

The grand opening will be on Cinco De Mayo and will be open seven days a week from  am to  pm at  W PERIOD Canal Dr. in Turlock California PERIOD
